title: SAP Datasphere OAuth2 Setup Guide
description: Steps to create OAuth2 client for API access

steps.title: Access SAP Datasphere Administration
steps.description: Log into your SAP Datasphere tenant as an administrator

steps.title: Navigate to OAuth Clients
steps.description: Go to System > Administration > App Integration > OAuth Clients

steps.title: Create New OAuth Client
steps.description: Click 'Add' to create a new OAuth client

steps.title: Grant Permissions
steps.description: Assign appropriate permissions to the OAuth client for API access

next_steps: Update the OAUTH_CONFIG in this script with the generated credentials
Test the connection using the OAuth2 client credentials
